body:
Hi Alejandro,

The colors are randomly assigned.

- Rob

On 5/26/15, 7:29 AM, "Alejandro Pacheco Di?guez" <paxeco2205 at hotmail.com<mailto:paxeco2205 at hotmail.com>> wrote:

Dear experts,
I was wondering whether the chk files generated by radiance to color the glare patches respond to a quantitative logic or they are just random colors assigned.
Thanks in advance,
Alejandro
subject: [Radiance-general] Colored glare patches
